main event: Mrs. Harold Covington and her son observed a strange, glowing object in the sky that hovered and maneuvered before shooting upward and disappearing.
interesting points: The object was approximately 30 feet in diameter with a pulsating reddish-orange light., The sighting occurred at approximately 10:45 P.M. on July 7, 1967., Witnesses reported the object maneuvering and hovering in the sky before ascending rapidly., The incident was classified as 'insufficient evidence to determine the nature of the object observed.', The report includes references to additional cases of unidentified flying objects in the same region.
sighted object: a glowing object with a pulsating reddish-orange light
witness description: Mrs. Harold Covington and her son
